agallery.title: Title
agallery.err_no_upload_perm: You don't have permission to upload.
agallery.err_title_invalid: Title is required and must not exceed the limit.
agallery.err_no_category_upload_access: You cannot upload to this category.
agallery.err_upload_too_large_server: Server rejected the file due to limits (upload_max_filesize/post_max_size).
agallery.err_ext_not_allowed: File extension is not allowed by settings.
agallery.err_cannot_decode: This format cannot be decoded on this server.
agallery.err_cannot_encode: This format cannot be safely re-encoded (enable allow_convert or remove the format).
agallery.err_animated_gif: Animated GIFs are not allowed. Enable allow_convert to convert to a static format.
agallery.err_no_view_access: You don't have access to view this category.
